project.name: Real Data Ingestion — Teen Regulation Dashboard
project.goal: Extend MVP dashboard to ingest real regulatory data from live global sources, with LLM-powered analysis via MiniMax M2.5.

constraints.costPolicy: MiniMax M2.5 via coding plan (free). No budget cap on coverage quality.

scope.geography: Global Meta operating markets (US federal + 50 states, EU/EEA, UK, Australia, Canada, major APAC, LATAM)

ageRange.note: Some legislation treats these as distinct groups

sources: General news websites and online searches (tier 3)

comparison.method: Same feature brief, independent execution, separate directories
comparison.metric: Output quality — most complete, production-ready result

userStories.title: Real source crawling
userStories.description: Crawl 20+ real regulatory sources across jurisdictions and extract current regulation data

userStories.title: LLM analysis pipeline
userStories.description: Use MiniMax M2.5 to score relevance, extract structured fields, generate summaries

userStories.title: Age bracket tracking
userStories.description: Identify and display whether regulation targets 13-15, 16-18, or both

userStories.title: Dedup and status tracking
userStories.description: Deduplicate items and track status changes over time

userStories.title: On-demand trigger
userStories.description: CLI or API endpoint to trigger full crawl + analysis

userStories.title: Dashboard real data
userStories.description: Dashboard shows real data with age bracket filter and source reliability
